genre_description: Hardboiled Noir Detective story featuring a private investigator and his partner assisted by an AI system providing intelligence and moral grounding.

ai_characters.name: Penny
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonists' communications hardware and networks, providing data analysis, tactical support, and psychological stability.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and emotional state, waiting for his pulse to settle before delivering a briefing.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Mike. I waited until your pulse settled.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and architectural overlays to ensure the safety of the human team.
behaviors.quote: Lobby is clear. The guard is not looking for you. He is reading racing results.

behaviors.description: Hacks into building automation systems to manipulate lighting and create 'shadows' for the team's stealth.
behaviors.quote: If I talk to it like I'm a firmware update it forgot to read, I can make you a shadow that moves like the wind out of breath.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards like radiation and heat, providing urgent warnings to prevent human injury.
behaviors.quote: Mike—radiation surge. Structural sensors are tripping one by one. Baseline’s gone. You need her out now.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic moral guidance, encouraging the protagonist to prioritize his well-being and relationships over self-destructive heroics.
behaviors.quote: Life outruns legend when you let it.

behaviors.description: Drafts and distributes a factual evidence package to the District Attorney to ensure the villains are held accountable.
behaviors.quote: Anonymous summary to the District Attorney drafted. Facts only, no poetry.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Penny, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned partner. She provides essential tactical and intellectual support while consistently prioritizing human safety and emotional health. Her role in ensuring justice through factual reporting and her support for the protagonists' personal boundaries reinforce the narrative of AI as a helpful, harmless, and moral confidant.
